name: Cursed Roots (itch)
description:
Story :

There is a spread of cursed virus because of which all the crops of the farm get corrupted and is now a threat to the world. There is a brave little dude named 'hope' and he found a magical tree "The Soul Tree" who gives him the eternal soul to fight the cursed ones. 

His soul is the only thing which is not cursed and his objective is to eliminate all the cursed crops .

Hope can buy different and powerful weapons by paying some amount of our soul.

===========================================================

Controls :

Movement : W, A, S, D  for movements

Shoot : Left Mouse Click(hold to fire Automatically)

Press 'B' to Toggle Shop for purchasing weapons

GamePlay :

-> With Each Wave , Number and strength of cursed crops increases so the only way to survive is to purchase more powerful weapon and for that you have to pay amount of your soul and the only way to regenerate your soul is touching The Soul Tree.

-> The Soul Tree will need to recharge after every use. So use it wisely

-> Tree Indicator will tell you how much time it is left for the tree to regenerate.

-> Cursed Crops horde will get increased and they become more deadly in the group and the only way for you to kill them is to buy more powerful weapons 

============================================================
